source.name: Oregon Recovery and Reinvestment Act Data - March, 2012
source.description: This spreadsheet contains Oregon Recovery and Reinvestment Act (ARRA) Data reported on the State of Oregon Recovery site (http://oregon.gov/recovery/StimulusReporting/ARRA_Projects.shtml). Please note that this data reflects the preliminary data from the most recent reporting period of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009, including data through March 30, 2011. This data available for viewing through an interactive map site. For this, and other information on ARRA projects, please visit Oregon's Economic Recovery site: http://www.oregon.gov/recovery. For the latest recovery award data, please visit http://www.recovery.gov.
